title: Virginia's 4th Senate district
text:
<a href="Virginia">Virginia</a>'s 4th Senate district is one of 40 districts in the <a href="Senate%20of%20Virginia">Senate of Virginia</a>. It has been represented by <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a> <a href="Ryan%20McDougle">Ryan McDougle</a> since his victory in a 2006 special election.
Geography.
District 4 stretches from just outside <a href="Fredericksburg%2C%20Virginia">Fredericksburg</a> to the <a href="Chesapeake%20Bay">Chesapeake Bay</a>, including all of the <a href="Northern%20Neck">Northern Neck</a> and parts of the <a href="Middle%20Peninsula">Middle Peninsula</a>. It covers all of <a href="Caroline%20County%2C%20Virginia">Caroline</a>, <a href="Essex%20County%2C%20Virginia">Essex</a>, <a href="Middlesex%20County%2C%20Virginia">Middlesex</a>, <a href="Lancaster%20County%2C%20Virginia">Lancaster</a>, <a href="Northumberland%20County%2C%20Virginia">Northumberland</a>, and <a href="Richmond%20County%2C%20Virginia">Richmond Counties</a>, as well as parts of <a href="Hanover%20County%2C%20Virginia">Hanover</a>, <a href="King%20George%20County%2C%20Virginia">King George</a>, <a href="Spotsylvania%20County%2C%20Virginia">Spotsylvania</a>, and <a href="Westmoreland%20County%2C%20Virginia">Westmoreland Counties</a>.
The district overlaps with Virginia's <a href="Virginia%27s%201st%20congressional%20district">1st</a> and <a href="Virginia%27s%207th%20congressional%20district">7th congressional districts</a>, and with the <a href="Virginia%27s%2054th%20House%20of%20Delegates%20district">54th</a>, <a href="Virginia%27s%2055th%20House%20of%20Delegates%20district">55th</a>, <a href="Virginia%27s%2097th%20House%20of%20Delegates%20district">97th</a>, <a href="Virginia%27s%2098th%20House%20of%20Delegates%20district">98th</a>, and <a href="Virginia%27s%2099th%20House%20of%20Delegates%20district">99th districts</a> of the <a href="Virginia%20House%20of%20Delegates">Virginia House of Delegates</a>.
Recent election results.
2019.
 
Historical results.
All election results below took place prior to 2011 redistricting, and thus were under different district lines.
